divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking outside to look at the stars there wasnt any so i kept looking around.Then i looked north of my house and i saw a very weird thing.It was a bright object in the sky just moving at supersonic speeds.I watched the object move for about 5 minutes.Then it stopped moving i watched it for more and it stayed there.It took off and vanished into the night sky.It was going east when the object vanished.I felt very watched when i saw that object.
Summary: Very bright light right above my house moving around.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Locust Gap
This sighting has never been favorited.
